  The pxToRem() function helps you to convert a px unit into a rem unit, 
 */function pxToRem(number){let baseNumber=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:16;return`${number/baseNumber}rem`;}export default pxToRem;
